alert.note: Alert for Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 4:01AM MST until December 31 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, wind and some additional snow accumulation will produce heavy drifting of snow and low visibility in blowing snow. * WHERE...The upper Snake River plain, including the cities of Idaho Falls, Rigby, and Rexburg, and the towns of Roberts, Chester, and Saint Anthony. * WHEN... For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 10 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Heavily drifting snow can hamper snow clearance efforts on roads and highways, forcing temporary road and highway closures. Find out the latest road conditions before heading out for First Night or New Year`s Eve celebrations. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
